name: Random Forest
description: An ensemble learning method using multiple decision trees. Good for classification and regression on structured data.

parameters.name: target_column
parameters.label: Target Column
parameters.help: Select the column containing the value your model should predict.

parameters.name: task_type
parameters.label: Task Type (Optional)
parameters.help: Specify task type. If omitted, it will be inferred from the target column.

parameters.name: test_size
parameters.label: Validation Split
parameters.help: Proportion of data held out for validation (e.g., 0.2 = 20%).

parameters.name: n_estimators
parameters.label: Number of Trees
parameters.help: The number of decision trees in the forest. More trees generally improve accuracy but increase training time. (Default: 100)

parameters.name: max_depth
parameters.label: Max Tree Depth
parameters.help: Maximum depth of individual trees. Leave empty for unlimited depth (can lead to overfitting). (Default: Unlimited)

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.label: Random Seed
parameters.help: Seed for random number generation to ensure reproducible results.
